/** * Interface for objects which can contain tasks. *

* It is recommended that implementations call perform rather than * execute for the tasks they contain, as this method ensures that the * appropriate BuildEvents will be generated. * * @see Task#perform * @see Task#execute * @see BuildEvent * */
